title: Flat Top Grill
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Chinese, Buffet, Take-out, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of chain restaurant offering Mongolian stir-fry meals. Could customize your meal as you take a bowl and fill it with toppings. Huge selection of fresh vegetables and grains as well as vegetarian protein such as seitan and quorn. Sauces are clearly labeled. Request to have your food be cooked separately in a wok so there is no contact with meat. Stir fried meals may also be changed into soups using vegetable broth or wraps.
